Uses of Service in sorcer.core.provider
 

Classes in sorcer.core.provider that implement Service
 class ServiceProvider
          The ServiceProvider class is a type of Provider with dependency injection defined by a Jini 2 configuration, proxy management, and own service discovery management for registering its proxies.
 class ServiceTasker
          A ServiceTasker is a service coordinating execution of all methods as specified by signatures associated with the instance of service Task and control flow exertion of task type.

          The facility for maintaining a cache of all SORCER OS :: providers Service s as specified by provider.template.match=sorcer.service.Service in the sorcer.env configuration file.

Subinterfaces of Service in sorcer.core.provider.proxy
 interface Outer
          Smart proxies and composite proxies extending their functionalty via calls on the inner proxies implement this interface.
 interface Partner
          Servers and other compound proxies using inner proxies to extend their functionalty via calls on the inner proxies implement this interface.
 interface RemotePartner
          Remote servers and other compound remote proxies using inner proxies to extend their functionality via calls on the inner proxies implement this interface.

Uses of Service in sorcer.service
 

Subinterfaces of Service in sorcer.service
 interface AsyncExertion
          An asynchronus exertion is a service-oriented indirect message with an enclosed service Context and a collection of service Signatures.
 interface Exertion
          An exertion is a federated service command (statement) communicated by a requestor - service(sorcer.service.Exertion, net.jini.core.transaction.Transaction), to a service provider Service.
 interface Jobber
          A service coordinating a Job execution by creating a runtime federation of all needed service providers to execute all component exertions of the received job.
 interface MonitoredExertion
           
 interface Spacer
          SORCER also extends task/job execution abilities through the use of a space rendezvous service implementing the Spacer interface.
 interface Tasker
          A Tasker is a service coordinating execution of all methods as specified by signatures associated with the instance of service Task and control flow exertion of task type.
 

Classes in sorcer.service that implement Service
 class Job
          A job is a composite service-oriented message comprised of Exertion instances with its own service Context and a collection of service Signatures.
 class ServiceExertion
           
 class Task
          A Task is an elementary service-oriented message Exertion (with its own service Context and a collection of service Signatures.
 

Methods in sorcer.service that return Service
 Service DynamicAccessor.getServicer(Signature signature)
          Returns a servicer matching its Signature.
static Service Accessor.getServicer(Signature signature)
          Returns a servicer matching its Signature using the particular factory accessor of this service accessor facility.
